msg: added a bunch of debugging statements to the expire area
added in some other checks, useful for force expire where an expire won't occur.

author: felicity
msg: replaced check_bayes_db since it only understand db format 0.  it now
just calls sa-learn with the --dump option, passing anything else along
added the --dbpath and --regexp options from check_bayes_db to
sa-learn/CmdLearn.  They only have an effect via --dump.
